email_chain.subject: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 150,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Alex Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY for this shipment. The starting freight rate is USD 25.50 per MT. The laycan is October 20-25. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

Thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the rate seems a bit high. Market rates are around USD 24.00 per MT. Can you adjust the rate accordingly?

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Alex,

I understand your concern. Given our long-standing relationship, I can offer a revised rate of USD 24.50 per MT. The OCEAN HARMONY is a reliable vessel with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Laura,

USD 24.50 per MT is acceptable. Please confirm the laycan dates and send over the contract details.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry for Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Alex,

Great! The laycan is confirmed for October 20-25. I will send the contract details shortly. Thank you for your business.

Best,
Laura
